Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: Margaret M. Bauer
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price.  Two major disappointments.  The first disappointment is the zoom distance and clarity.  I have older Olympus camera's that have a greater zooming.The second disappointment was that after using the camera under water, the label on the knob fell off.  Now I can't see what I am setting the camera to.  Yes, I would recommend this camera to a friend.  The camera took excellent photos close up under water while scuba diving in Aruba.

Reviews.Title: Tough tg2
Reviews.Author: MarvinDaMartians
Reviews.Content: Bought tg820 last year end up giving away to father in-law cuz he was blew away when I soaked it in the sink it still takes great picture. Bought tg2 as an upgrade plus, the center optics is much betta than tg820 upper left gets in the way of from fore-finger. Seller sent bout what described as product/shipping time.

Reviews.Title: good pics when it focuses
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Dahmes ""Dr. Rob""
Reviews.Content: The little accessory package is great....everything you need, but the camera has some difficulty focusing on objects with no contrast such as a black dog.  However, it's wonderful for being around water and not having to worry.
